SENT.plain: Behçet's disease, affecting mostly young males in the Mediterranean countries and Japan, is a multi-system disease with urological manifestations
In this prospective study of 100 consecutive patients with newly diagnosed Behçet's disease, we found that 89% of the males had experienced scrotal ulceration and 6% had epididymitis
We also observed sterile urethritis in 3%
Other urological abnormalities appeared to be coincidental findings
